category.name: New Hobbies to Explore
category.description: A collection of hobbies to explore at your own pace, without time constraints. Discover new interests and find activities that bring you joy.

tasks.name: Photography
tasks.desc: Learn the basics of photography, such as composition, lighting, and camera settings. Capture the beauty around you and create lasting memories.

tasks.name: Gardening
tasks.desc: Discover the joys of gardening by planting flowers, vegetables, or herbs. Learn about soil, watering, and proper plant care to create a thriving garden.

tasks.name: Cooking
tasks.desc: Expand your culinary skills by learning new recipes and techniques. Experiment with different cuisines and create delicious meals for yourself and others.

tasks.name: Drawing
tasks.desc: Develop your artistic skills by learning to draw. Start with basic shapes and shading techniques before moving on to more complex subjects and styles.

tasks.name: Playing a musical instrument
tasks.desc: Choose a musical instrument that interests you and learn how to play it. Develop your musical skills and enjoy the process of creating beautiful melodies.
